title: Diwali Festival Celebration
summary: Join the vibrant Diwali celebration with traditional food, music, and cultural performances.
description:
Celebrate the Festival of Lights with Brisbane's Indian community! This family-friendly event features:

  • Traditional Indian food stalls
  • Cultural dance performances
  • Rangoli art workshops
  • Fireworks display
  • Henna art sessions

Bring your family and friends to experience the warmth and joy of Diwali. Entry is free, food and activities available for purchase.

title: Chinese New Year Market
summary: Experience authentic Chinese New Year traditions with food, crafts, and cultural activities.
description:
Welcome the Year of the Snake with traditional celebrations! Features include:

  • Lion dance performances
  • Traditional Chinese food vendors
  • Calligraphy workshops
  • Red envelope making
  • Traditional games and activities

Perfect for families and anyone interested in Chinese culture. Come dressed in red for good luck!

title: International Food Festival
summary: Taste cuisines from around the world at this annual celebration of cultural diversity.
description:
Join us for a culinary journey around the world! This festival showcases:

  • Food stalls from 20+ countries
  • Cooking demonstrations
  • Cultural performances
  • Kids' activities
  • Live music from different cultures

Bring your appetite and curiosity - this is a celebration of Brisbane's incredible cultural diversity!

title: International Student Orientation
summary: Essential orientation for new international students starting their Australian university journey.
description:
Welcome to UQ! This comprehensive orientation covers:

  • Campus tour and facilities
  • Academic expectations and support services
  • Visa and compliance requirements
  • Health and safety information
  • Social activities and clubs
  • Meet other international students

Mandatory for all new international students. Lunch and refreshments provided.

title: Academic Writing Workshop
summary: Improve your academic writing skills with expert guidance on structure, citations, and style.
description:
Struggling with academic writing? This workshop covers:

  • Essay structure and planning
  • Academic tone and style
  • Citation and referencing (APA/Harvard)
  • Common mistakes to avoid
  • Proofreading techniques

Bring a sample of your writing for personalized feedback. Limited to 25 participants.

title: Career Fair for International Students
summary: Connect with employers who value international experience and cultural diversity.
description:
Explore career opportunities with employers who actively recruit international students:

  • Meet representatives from 50+ companies
  • Learn about graduate programs
  • Practice interview skills
  • Get resume feedback
  • Network with industry professionals

Dress professionally and bring copies of your resume. Pre-registration required.

title: International Students Soccer Tournament
summary: Join the annual soccer tournament featuring teams from different countries and cultures.
description:
Show your national pride on the soccer field! Tournament features:

  • Teams representing different countries
  • Round-robin format
  • Food and drinks available
  • Prizes for winners
  • Cultural performances between matches

Teams of 7 players. Registration closes November 25th. Equipment provided.

title: Beach Volleyball Social
summary: Fun beach volleyball session at South Bank Beach with international students.
description:
Enjoy Brisbane's beautiful weather with beach volleyball! Event includes:

  • Mixed teams (all skill levels welcome)
  • Equipment provided
  • BBQ dinner
  • Swimming after volleyball
  • Socializing and networking

Bring swimwear, towel, and sunscreen. No volleyball experience necessary!

title: Hiking Adventure: Mount Coot-tha
summary: Explore Brisbane's natural beauty with a guided hike to Mount Coot-tha lookout.
description:
Discover Brisbane's best views on this guided hike! Includes:

  • Transport from UQ campus
  • Guided hike to summit
  • Panoramic city views
  • Breakfast at lookout caf√©
  • Wildlife spotting

Moderate fitness level required. Bring water bottle and comfortable walking shoes.

title: Brisbane Festival Opening Night
summary: Experience the spectacular opening night of Brisbane's premier arts and culture festival.
description:
Celebrate the start of Brisbane Festival with an incredible night of arts and culture:

  • Free outdoor performances
  • Food trucks and bars
  • Interactive art installations
  • Live music stages
  • Fireworks finale

This is Brisbane's biggest cultural event - don't miss it! Free entry to most events.

title: Riverfire Spectacular
summary: Witness Brisbane's most spectacular fireworks display over the Brisbane River.
description:
Experience Brisbane's most iconic event! Riverfire features:

  • Massive fireworks display
  • Military aircraft flyovers
  • River parade of illuminated boats
  • Live entertainment
  • Food and drink vendors

Best viewing spots: South Bank, Kangaroo Point, and City Botanic Gardens. Arrive early!

title: Eat Street Markets
summary: Indulge in Brisbane's most popular food market with international cuisine and live entertainment.
description:
Join Brisbane's most vibrant food market! Features:

  • 80+ food vendors
  • International cuisine from around the world
  • Live music and entertainment
  • Artisan crafts and gifts
  • Riverside dining experience

Entry fee includes access to all entertainment. Food and drinks available for purchase.
